name: First Impression
description: You make quite the entrance, quickly attacking a creature. This attack can only be used on the first turn that the user has entered combat.Â Make a melee attack on a creature, doing 2d8 + MOVE bug damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
